name: SILK BUSTIER DRESS
description:
Pure silk crepe cerise pink bustier dress with contrasting
bilberry silk straps and navy silk back.

Fully lined.

Handmade with care in Britain.

Skirt Length - waist to hem 79cm / 31" ( Length can be adjusted on request )

UK Size 8 / US 4 / EUR 36 / AU 8 
Bust - 34" Waist - 26 "

UK Size 10 / US 6 / EUR 38 / AU 10 
Bust - 34" Waist - 28"

UK Size 12 / US 8 / EUR 40 / AU 12 
Bust - 36" Waist - 29"
